alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 10:20PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 1115 PM EDT... At 1019 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Marco Island Airport, or near Marco Island, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Chokoloskee, Golden Gate Estates, Everglades City, Plantation Island, Carnestown, Belle Meade, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Copeland, Royal Palm Hammock, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
